name: fumblingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an awkward, embarrassing, or nervous way: Fumblingly, and shaking with excitement, I struggled to put on my trainers. He was different from all the boys who had fumblingly kissed her before.
More examplesFewer examplesTo avoid embarrassing the librarian, she fumblingly hunted in her bag for her library card.Feeling nervous, he fumblingly typed in the name and pressed the return key.We were impressed by his portrayal of a young man fumblingly seduced by a fellow traveller.
